title: How is traditional Chinese medicine similar to alchemy?
description: Answer (1 of 3): Alchemy is trying to turn base substances into gold. It is the base of what would become Chemistry. TCM shares a similarity in that it sought to turn natural substances (Herbs) into medicine. Drugs of botanical origin which are too many to list here owe a substantial debt to the ...
